description:
This course covers the history of Monopoly, strategies to employ to win the game, and how to use Monopoly to teach children important life lessons. You will learn that the game has 2 distinct phases each with a different strategy, and that jail is not always a bad thing. You will also learn how to trade effectively during each phase of the game.

Examples of property names are based on the US game. Â A link is provided within the course to convert US properties to other versions.
title: How to win at Monopoly and use the game to teach children
